tasks.title: Setup Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize project repository, set up initial dependencies and folder structure.

tasks.title: Design Mockups
tasks.description: Create mockups for the dashboard, task detail modal, and filters.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Add login and registration functionality with form validation.

tasks.title: Setup Redux for State Management
tasks.description: Implement Redux to manage global state for tasks and filters.

tasks.title: Create Task List Component
tasks.description: Develop a component to display tasks in a list format with sorting and filtering capabilities.

tasks.title: Implement Task Search
tasks.description: Add search functionality to filter tasks by title or description.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests for Task Components
tasks.description: Write unit tests for Task List, Task Details Modal, and Task Creation Form components.

tasks.title: Add Dark Mode Support
tasks.description: Implement a dark mode toggle to switch between light and dark themes.

tasks.title: Optimize Task List Rendering
tasks.description: Use React.memo or virtualization to improve performance for large task lists.

tasks.title: Bug Fixes and Code Refactoring
tasks.description: Fix known bugs and refactor code for better readability and maintainability.
